main event: A bright light was observed over the Pacific Ocean near 37-20N 124-08W on 8 September 1962.
interesting points: The light was described as larger than a star and stationary for about 5 minutes before disappearing,The crew of a commercial jet observed the light at around 9:00 p.m. local time,The Air Force was unable to identify the light object,The sighting occurred approximately 300 miles west of the California coast,The target was reported as a sudden very fast object almost directly overhead before it was gone.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: crew of a commercial jet aircraft
